text: Chen Jiannian (; born 1 August 1967) tribal name Pur-dur, is a Taiwanese Puyuma singer.Perfect Beat 2000 "Ji Xiaojun (also known by her Puyuma name 'Samingad') won the best new artist award while her Chen Jiannin (aka Pur-dur) was awarded best male vocalist and the best songwriter prize" ==Discography== *Haiyang 1999《海洋》 *Dadi 2002《大地》 ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Puyuma people Category:Taiwanese male singers
title: Chen Jiannian
